mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (rv_id, m_title, dept, start_dt, end_dt, rv_user, rv_writer,reg_dt, m_id) VALUES (reserv_seq.nextval, #{mTitle}, #{dept}, #{startDt}, #{endDt}, #{rvUser}, #{rvWriter}, sysdate, #{mId})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.m_id AS mId, m.m_name AS mName, r.m_id AS rmId FROM meetingroom m LEFT JOIN reservation r ON m.m_id = r.m_id WHERE m.m_id = #{mId}
